txt.en: 'I cannot believe that someone has come to my aid. I thought this nightmare would never end. My mother is Éa, perhaps you have heard of her? It has been such a long time without my loved ones.\n\n'Please help me return to her. I fear that I cannot make it back on my own.'
'My Dírdrë is safe? Oh, thank you! Thank you, brave Southron!'
You have found Dírdrë, daughter of Éa, alive and well.
Éa is at Tármunn Súrsa, near Carn Dûm.\n\nDírdrë has asked your aid returning to her mother, Éa.
Éa is at Tármunn Súrsa, near Carn Dûm.\n\nYou returned Dírdrë to the Hillmen. You should speak with Éa, her mother, at once.
